member.name: T:Breadcrumb.Plugin.BreadcrumbMiddleware
member.summary: Breadcrumb middleware class, this module extends BaseMiddlware and is injected into the request pipeline.

member.name: M:Breadcrumb.Plugin.BreadcrumbMiddlewareExtender.UseBreadcrumbs(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder)
member.summary:
IApplicationBuilder extender method.
Allows easy use of registering UserSessionMiddleware.Plugin

member.name: T:Breadcrumb.Plugin.BreadcrumbSettings
member.summary: Settings which affect how breadcrumb data is served.

member.name: P:Breadcrumb.Plugin.BreadcrumbSettings.ProcessStaticFiles
member.summary: Determines whether breadcrumb data is applied to static filed, .css, .js etc

member.name: P:Breadcrumb.Plugin.BreadcrumbSettings.StaticFileExtensions
member.summary: Delimited list of file extensions to ignore

member.name: P:Breadcrumb.Plugin.BreadcrumbSettings.HomeName
member.summary: Name of home, usually Home or similar. If Localization is enabled then this will be the value looked up from resource strings.

member.name: P:Breadcrumb.Plugin.BreadcrumbSettings.HomeController
member.summary: Name of home controller, without the Controller appendage, i.e. Home

member.name: P:Breadcrumb.Plugin.BreadcrumbSettings.DefaultAction
member.summary: Default action name for home route.

member.name: T:Breadcrumb.Plugin.Classes.SystemAdmin.BreadcrumbTimingsSubMenu
member.summary:
Returns Timings information for all time spent processing Breadcrumb requests and can be viewed within SystemAdmin.Plugin.
This class descends from SystemAdminSubMenu.

member.name: M:Breadcrumb.Plugin.Classes.SystemAdmin.BreadcrumbTimingsSubMenu.Data
member.summary: Returns Timings data in milliseconds for time spent processing by Breadcrumb.Plugin requests.

member.name: T:Breadcrumb.Plugin.PluginInitialisation
member.summary: Implements IPlugin which allows the Breadcrumb.Plugin module to be loaded as a plugin module
